metadata.title: Travel Portfolio | Photography
metadata.description: A personal travel photography portfolio showcasing stunning captures from around the world.

hero.title: Capturing the World,
hero.description: Travel photography that tells stories. From the peaks of Patagonia to the streets of Tokyo, explore the beauty of our world through my lens.

featured.title: Featured Work
featured.description: A selection of my favorite captures from recent travels

gallery.noPhotos: No photos match the selected filters.

professional.intro: I'm a software developer with 10+ years of experience specializing in React, TypeScript, and Next.js development. Based in Slovakia (Central European Time), I work with international teams building complex web applications.
professional.experience: I've been a core developer on analytics dashboards and data visualization tools, currently working on enterprise applications with extensive filtering systems and large-scale data handling.
professional.whatIDo1: Build React/Next.js applications (dashboards, SaaS platforms, data-heavy interfaces)
professional.whatIDo2: SEO & performance optimization (recently improved load times 10x, scaled indexing from 10k to 1M pages)
professional.approach: I leverage AI tools to accelerate development while maintaining security best practices. I work with modern tooling (Next.js LTS, TypeScript, Tailwind, TanStack Query, Git workflows) and can scale projects with trusted development partners when needed.

personal.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you'll find me climbing, hiking, skiing, or traveling with my camera. I've explored 40+ countries and regularly give talks at outdoor and travel festivals.
personal.home: At home, I play guitar, read, and spend time with Kocurenko (my cat has his own page).
personal.prints: I also sell travel photography prints from my adventures around the world.
